content: nerd gremlin image working backwards when making the other eye sew the eyes to the head just above the nose pull the tails through the head to temporarily position the eyes then use the white tail and green tails to sew the eyes to the head sew up and down rather than looping around so you don t see too much sewing yarn thread pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin sew the black nostrils with a small amount of black yarn carron is 4 ply yarn split it into 2 strands and use a tapestry needle to sew the nostrils to the face i entered through the side of the nose this tail can be hid in the nose later then came out the upper right point then down the right lower point then up one stitch the the left then down the upper left point then back out the hole i started in and tied the two tails together and hid them in the nose pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin you can see all the tails that i hid in the body add zipper add the zipper in the same way as the pokeball but you can use all yellow thread combine the pokeball and the pokemon together put the pokeball inside the pokemon such that you can see the outside of the pokeball i e wrong sides together also put the pokeball in upside down so when both zippers are unzipped the pulls of the zippers are on opposite sides use yellow thread and sew the two sides of the opening together make sure your needle only just catches the zipper and the back side of the yarn threads so you don t see yellow thread on the pokeball side try to open and close the zipper that is on the outside flip and do the same for the other way if it does not close don t force it look for where it s getting caught you might have a loose thread that got caught or maybe the medal head of the zipper got caught in the zipper ribbon
